tests.name: Test 1
tests.run: timeout 30 ./compress -mtf tests/canterbury/alice29.txt output1 && timeout 30 ./compress -d output1 output2 && cmp output2 tests/canterbury/alice29.txt

tests.name: Test 2
tests.run: timeout 30 ./compress -lz77 tests/canterbury/alice29.txt output1 && timeout 30 ./compress -d output1 output2 && cmp output2 tests/canterbury/alice29.txt
